name: ci
description: Cypress is a next generation front end testing tool built for the modern web. We address the key pain points developers and QA engineers face when testing modern applications.

scripts.10travlr-production: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/10travlr/production/regression/**/*' --headless --browser chrome --record --key e73f75bc-9ff2-4600-8eca-1f9570abf53e --tag 10TRAVLR, PRODUCTION
